entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:03 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 7:09 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 4 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain mixed with snow this afternoon and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h this morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and local blowing snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 40 gusting to 70 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
